channel.title: Connection Issues
channel.description: Hello, I just started a server that is currently being hosted from my computer. I have a friend at my house at the moment, and he is using a different computer. He installed the client but he cannot connect. I changed the client IP to 127.0.0.1 in the gui.java but even that didn't work. I was just wondering if there is something else I need to change. Help is extremely appreciated.

item.title: Connection Issues
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

If your on the same network, the other computer uses the hosts IPv4 as the server address.

Read full topic
